title: Economic Crisis and Globalization - Neeraj Jain | Socialist Unity Conference, 2016 | Mumbai
description: This is a small session given by Neeraj Jain, on rising economic crisis as effect of globalization during National Socialist Conference, 2016, which was held at Mumbai. He explains the way private corporates are given subsidies and allowed to plunder the natural resources

title: India at 70 : Democracy under strain | Siddharth Varadrajan | Lokayat | Independence Day 2016
description: Siddharth Varadrajan, (ex-Editor of The Hindu - a premier news paper daily and Founder of The wire - professional, radical on line news portal thewire.in) brings out some important aspects of multiple stresses on Democracy in India after 70 years of independence.

title: Lokayat Annual Meeting - Concluding Talk - Neeraj Jain
description: The world is facing an acute economic crisis and in all major countries, fascism is rising as a political force again. In this talk, Neeraj Jain, Lokayat Convener, explains the social, economic and political reasons for this rise of fascism in India in particular and the world in general. How we should face this challenge is also addressed. Talk delivered at the Lokayat annual meeting , 24th July 2016
